GSP29vnyps00u:4: prabandharatnamidaṃ jayati jīvitamiva nyāyavistarasya vidyāsthānasya śrībhagavadrāmānujamunivarakṣuṇṇavartmano
GSP29vnyps00u:6: anupajīvya cedaṃ vidyāsthānaṃ ko vibhavaḥ sapanditumapi śeṣasya vidyāsthānajātasya ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:7: sarvameva hi loke śrutaṃ saṃśayaviparyayābhyāmāhitapāriplavaṃ vātyāspṛṣṭamiva tṛṇaśakalaṃ na kathañcidapi pratitiṣṭhati /
GSP29vnyps00u:8: pramāṇaparīkṣayā tu yathāvadupapāditayā dṛṣadeva vyapoḍhavikṣobhaṃ niṣkampamavatiṣṭhate /
GSP29vnyps00u:10: padavākyapramāṇabhedena hi tredhā vibhajanti śāstraṃ śāstravidaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:13: pramāṇaṃ tu---kvacidapyartheṣvanavagāḍhāvaṣṭambhāṃ svātmanyapyanupajātavisrambhāṃ ḍolāyamānāṃ buddhiṃ kareṇumiva tarkaśṛṅkhalābhirālānayanmananavyapadeśaṃ śāstram ;
GSP29vnyps00u:15: tadetat pramāṇapradhānamapi pramāṇagateḥ prameyasvarūpavivecanaparyavasānatayā prameyepi nyastapadaṃ pravṛttam /
GSP29vnyps00u:17: cānyathā ca prameyaṃ pratipadyamānairitastataḥ parikṛṣyamāṇāni pramāṇānyapi parāvṛttarūpatayā
GSP29vnyps00u:19: mānābhāsavyāmiśrāṇi hi mānāni na sukarāṇi vivektum /
GSP29vnyps00u:20: tadevaṃ śāstrameva paṅkilīkṛtaṃ cakṣuriva timiropasṛṣṭaṃ vigalitārthagrahaṇāpāṭava saṃvṛttam /
GSP29vnyps00u:25: ataḥ sarvopayogāya doṣaguṇahānopādānābhyāṃ śikṣaṇīyasyāsya nyāyavistarasya pṛthakprasthānaṃ nyāyadarśanaṃ nāma sūtrajātaṃ gautamena muninā prathamaṃ praṇītam ;
GSP29vnyps00u:26: yatra pramāṇāpramāṇādivivecanayā tattvanirṇayopāyāstatra ca saṃbhavanto guṇadoṣāḥ kathāsu ca grāhyāparihāryavibhāgāḥ saviśeṣaṃ pradarśitāḥ //
GSP29vnyps00u:27: tacca nyāyadarśanaṃ prathamaṃ pramāṇaprameyādisūtreṇa ṣoḍaśadhā padārthān vibhajya tatparīkṣaṇena caritārthama /
GSP29vnyps00u:29: manyamānena kaṇādena muninā kṛtsnameva prameyajātaṃ dravyādisaptapadārthaparisaṃkhyānenāsaṃkīrṇaṃ vibhaktam /
GSP29vnyps00u:30: tatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyābhāvān vitathamevāpadārthān padārthayatā tathāvidhameva
GSP29vnyps00u:31: cānyadanyadālapatā grāhyamagṛhṇatā tyājyaṃ cātyajatā kaṇabhakṣeṇa dūramapathīkṛtaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:32: śāstrapatha iti brahmasūtrakārādibhiḥ pratikṣipto vaiśeṣikaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:34: iti manyamānāḥ katipayasaṃskārasaṃskṛtamimaṃ pakṣaṃ parigṛhya nibandhān nibabandhuḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:36: te ca nibandhā eṣu divaseṣu nāmnaiva kevalamavaśiṣyantotadyathā--śrīmannāthamunimiśrapraṇītaṃ nyāyatattvam,
GSP29vnyps00u:38: śrībhagavadyāmunācāryāṇāmācāryaiḥ śrīmannāthamunicaraṇāśrayāṇāṃ śrīpuṇḍarīkākṣāṇāṃ śiṣyaiśca śrīrāmamiśragurubhirviracitaṃ vivaraṇaṃ ṣaḍarthasaṃkṣepaśceti
GSP29vnyps00u:41: asyaiva ca nyāyapariśuddhipraṇeturācāryasyācāryeṇa mātulena ca vādihaṃsāmbuvāhaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:43: nyāyakuliśābhidhānaṃ cetyete nibandhāḥ nyāyapariśuddhikṛtaivācāryeṇa tatra tatra
GSP29vnyps00u:45: yadeva yāvadeva cācāryeṇa kvacit kvacidudāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ vākyakhaṇḍaṃ vā,
GSP29vnyps00u:51: atīte ca gaṇarātre kaiścidarvācīnairāvirbhūtairgranthakṛdbhirajñātapūrvavṛttāntairyathākathañcidvyākhyānena kaścidupakāraḥ kṛta iti //
GSP29vnyps00u:55: prācāmācāryāṇāṃ vāgvistarā etarhi śrotumapi durlabhatāṃ gamitārḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:56: idṛśoyaṃ vidyāvadhaḥ kasya vā vidyāvyasanino na dūnoti mānasam ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:58: asyaivācāryasya vāṅmadhuniṣyando mudhaiva kiyān na visraṃsitaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:63: niyataśrāvyatayā rahasyasaṃjñitāni siddhāntaniṣkarṣaṇedaṃparāṇi lokaśreyase jātāni granthajātāni /
GSP29vnyps00u:64: tatra vedānte tāvat tattvaṭīkā nāma śrībhagavadrāmānujamunivaraviracitasya śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyasya
GSP29vnyps00u:67: sā ca prathamasūtramātramapi yāvadasamagropalabdhapracārā vedāntavidyāvicārakāṅkṣiṇāṃ cintāvyasanāyaiva khaṇḍabhūtā paridṛśyate /
GSP29vnyps00u:68: vicitrāyodhanākuṇṭhaśaktau tejasvini svāṃ śakti samagramadarśayitvaiva niyatiyaiyātyenākasmāduparataṃ yodharatne taṭasthadṛṣṭe kasya vā vīradharmamanutiṣṭhato hṛdayaṃ na dūyeta /
GSP29vnyps00u:70: kecinmanyeran ācāryaireva na samāpūritāyaṃ grantha iti,
GSP29vnyps00u:71: tadetat svopamānena sarvatra śaktiparicchedaṃ kalayatāṃ pralapitamatra na kramate /
GSP29vnyps00u:72: trividhāḥ khalu loke prabandhakṛtaḥ---kecidgurukulacirapariśramairanekaśaḥ śrutān yathāśrutamarthān patreṣu viniveśya prakāśayanto lokamanugṛhṇanti
GSP29vnyps00u:77: anye tu nirantarabhajanakṛtaprasadanena bhagavatā sarveśvareṇa dūrapratyūḍhapratyūhavipruṣo
GSP29vnyps00u:80: yeṣāmekapratibhāsūtrasyūtāni prameyaratnāni punaḥ punaḥ pariśīlitānyapi navanavānīva
GSP29vnyps00u:81: prajñāvatāṃ hṛdayeṣu kamapi camatkāramāvahanti na ca kadācit purāṇacitravad vicchāyāni bhavanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:82: nyāpariśuddhikṛdācāryastu dvitīyatṛtīyayorubhayorapri kakṣyayoḥ hārāvalyoriva nāyakamaṇiḥ prakāśata iti tattvavidāmaparokṣam /
GSP29vnyps00u:86: evaṅguṇena cācāryacūḍāmaṇipavanā śiṣyabuddhiṃ prasādayitumārabdhā kṛtirasamāpya madhye apaviddhā bhavatīti ko nukhalu prabhāvavedī pratipattumarhati
GSP29vnyps00u:89: iti svakṛtasya bhāṣyapravacanasya aṣṭāviṃśyāmāvṛttau tattvaṭīkānibandhapraṇayanamācāryastattvaṭīkāprārambhe svayameva spaṣṭamāha /
GSP29vnyps00u:91: śreyaḥ śrīmān veṅkaṭanāthaḥ śrutipathyaṃ nāthaprītyai nāṭakamarthyaṃ vyadhitaitat” //
GSP29vnyps00u:92: iti sūtradhāravācā śārīrakabhāṣyapravacanaṃ saṃkalpasūryodayanirmāṇakāle triṃśadvārakṛtaṃ prathayati /
GSP29vnyps00u:94: tataḥ paścāt pravacanāvṛttayastatopi hi bhūyasyo bhavitumarhanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:97: śatadūṣaṇyāḥ samanantaraṃ tattvaṭīkā kṛteti ca pratīyate /
GSP29vnyps00u:98: uktaṃ hi svayamevācāryaistattvaṭīkāṃ prakramamāṇaiḥ--- “śātitaḥ śatadūṣaṇyāṃ śaṅkarādimudhāgrahaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:102: pravartitā ca pātreṣu tasmai śreṣṭhāya maṅgalam //
GSP29vnyps00u:110: naite śrutaprakāśikāyāmanyatra vā granthāntare pratipattuṃ sulabhāḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:111: kiñca svācāryairvādihaṃsāmbuvāhāryaiḥ praṇīte vidyamāna eva hi nyāyakuliśākhye nyāyanibandharatne nyāyapariśuddhimācāryaḥ svayaṃ nibabandha
GSP29vnyps00u:112: avaśyavaktavyeṣu cārtheṣu joṣaṃbhāvaḥ kathañcidapi śāsrācāryatāyāḥ sadṛśo na bhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:116: mahāmatibhirapi sarvajñasakāśāt śuśrūṣitasya pratipādanārthamapūrvāyāḥ kṛteḥ samārambha iti /
GSP29vnyps00u:118: kiñca nijanibandhasya śrutaprakāśikārakṣaṇāṅgīkārasamaya eva labdhaprasaratāmanusmṛtya parakīyagranthapravacanamaṅgīkṛtamācāryairiti śakyamabhyūhitum
GSP29vnyps00u:121: yathāhi nyāyasiddhāñjanamapi jaḍadravyaparicche denaiva paryavasitaṃ sāṃprataṃ paridṛśyate,
GSP29vnyps00u:124: itthamamumarthaṃ śrīraṅgarāmānujagurureva nyāyasiddhāñjanavyākhyāne “na kvāpyataḥ paramadṛsyata kośaśeṣa- staccheṣapūraṇakṛtiḥ parihāsahetuḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:125: jñātavyamanyadapi tairniraṇāyi samya- ggranthāntareṣviti na kiñcidihāsti cintyam” //
GSP29vnyps00u:129: śeṣe tu mithyaiva kimapyaitihyaṃ kalpayitvā katipaye prajalpanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:130: yattāvat dvaitamatakhaṇḍanaparaḥ śeṣo granthaḥ madhvamatasthena kenacidyatinā bhikṣāmaṭatā savinayamupasṛtya prārthitoyamācāryaḥ taṃ tasya bhikṣārthe
GSP29vnyps00u:137: śatadūṣaṇī ca śaṅkādikṛtasūtravyākhyānādinirāsārthameva pravṛtteti ca tadgranthamukha eva sphuṭībhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:138: tatra hi ---- “prācīmupetya padavīṃ yatirājadṛṣṭāṃ tatsaṃnikṛṣṭamapi vā matamāśrayantaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:139: prājñā yathoditamidaṃ śukavat paṭhantaḥ pracchannabauddhavijaye parito yatadhvam” //
GSP29vnyps00u:141: atra 'tatsaṃnikṛṣṭamapi vā matamāśrayantaḥ' ityanena dvaitinaḥ svapakṣīkriyante /
GSP29vnyps00u:143: tathā ca---vidyāraṇyākṣobhyamunivivāde nirṇayaṃ bruvadbhirācāryeḥ “asinā tattvamasinā parajīvaprabhedinā /
GSP29vnyps00u:147: ' ityatra tu śaṅkarādītyādipadaṃ yādavabhāskarayoḥ saṃgrahāyeti sthitam /
GSP29vnyps00u:150: hi gauḍadeśīyaḥ paṇḍitacūḍāmaṇiḥ sarvāsu vidyāsu kalāsu ca saviśeṣakṛtaśramaḥ kaviśca
GSP29vnyps00u:151: brahmādvaitaṃ siddhantamātiṣṭhamāno vādakutūhalitayā sarvā diśaḥ paryaṭan jitakāśī
GSP29vnyps00u:153: tatra śrīraṅgaṃ divyakṣetraṃ viduṣāmāvāsamākarṇya devasevāpadeśena vādasamaramarthayamānaḥ śrīraṅgarājasya bhavagataḥ prāsādamāsadāda /
GSP29vnyps00u:154: tadānīṃ tatra bhāṣāmayīrgāthāḥ sarāgatālaṃ gīyamānā niśamya tatkartṝṇāṃ ca kavīnāṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:155: varṇāvarāṇāmapi pratimāstasmin devālaye devopacārairārādhyamānā viditvā tatra sevāsamavetān
GSP29vnyps00u:157: bhavatāmanenāpabhraṃśapāṭhena varṇāvarapūjanena ca dūrāpoḍhaṃ veṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:159: anthathākṛtamakṛtaṃ hi bhavati' iti sākṣepaṃ papraccha /
GSP29vnyps00u:162: pratiṣṭhāprabhṛti sarva evālayasaṃskāraḥ kāryaḥ pratyagra eva iti ca niyamya taṃ divyālayaṃ gāḍhaghaṭitārgaladvāraṃ parityaktāśeṣapūjotsavaṃ ca kārayāmāsa /
GSP29vnyps00u:164: durante duḥkhasāgare nimagnāstaṃ ca prativādinaṃ sarvavidyāviśāradaṃ vādāhavanavaśūramaprakampyamākalayantaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:165: sabhāmabhinavāṃ kāmapi saṃgamayya tasyānarthasya kiñcidapi pratividhānaṃ cintayāmāsuḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:166: tasmin mahati sadasi viduṣāṃ saṃpradāyācāryaḥ śrīmān lokācāryaḥ sarveṣāṃ sabhāsadāmavadheyavacanaḥ samarthāmabhyarhitāṃ vācamādade--- “bhoḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:167: balavantaṃ paripanthinaṃ parāṅmukhīkartumupāyaḥ kaścidatra me pratibhāti /
GSP29vnyps00u:169: asti kila kāñcyāṃ nagaryāṃ veṅkaṭanāthāryo nāma viduṣāṃ prathamaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:170: sa hi vṛṣaśailanāthasya ghaṇṭāṃśa evāvatīrṇaḥ iti tattvavidāṃ grahaṇam /
GSP29vnyps00u:171: soyaṃ pañcavarṣadeśīyaḥ śiśureva san nijamātulena vādihaṃsāmbuvāhenātreyarāmānujācāryeṇa
GSP29vnyps00u:172: śārīrakabhāṣyagrahaṇāya varadagurusakāśaṃ gacchatā priyabhāgineyena nītastatra bhāṣyaviṣaye
GSP29vnyps00u:173: prasaktān bahūn saṃdehaśṛṅkhalāgranthīn visraṃsayaṃstayā tatrasamavetayā prajñāvṛddhapariṣadā
GSP29vnyps00u:178: ' ityāśiṣaṃ prayuñjānena 'asya kumārasya svataḥ pratibhātasamastaśāstrārthasārasya vidyāsaṃskāramātraphalo gurūpadeśo bhaviṣyati /
GSP29vnyps00u:179: na tu jñāne kaścidapi śaktileśa ādheyo bhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:180: bhagavānapi hi devakīnandanaḥ vidyāgrahaṇāya sāṃdīpinerācāryasya sakāśe gurukulavāsamagrahīt /
GSP29vnyps00u:181: kiṃ cāsya śaiśava evāyaṃ prajñāprakarṣo dāśaratheriva vikramatiśayo janmasiddhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:183: sābhyasūyāḥ savismāyā vā dṛśo nāsmin bālavayasi patitumarhanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:184: dṛṣṭidoṣairhi viṣānalairiva prasaradbhistarava ivāvalāḍhāḥ kati nāma mahāguṇāḥ puruṣāḥ svaguṇairlokamanupakṛtyaivāstaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:186: śrībhagavadrāmānujasiddhāntasyaiṣa jayadhvajaḥ samucchrīyatām' iyādiśya śiśurasau nijamātule vādihaṃsāmbudācārye nyāsīkṛtaḥ //
GSP29vnyps00u:187: athāsau vayasā viṃśativarṣadeśīya eva san sarvatomukhaprasṛtaprabodhatayā pareṣāmanabhibhavanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:188: evamakṣayyapratibhādraviṇena sarveṣvapi ca tantreṣu nirāmayaṃ panthānamavagantuṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:189: prasādayituṃ cālaṅkarmīṇena cācāryeṇā sārdhaṃ kadācit kāñcīnagare devadevasya bhagavataḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:192: kṛtapraśastināmadheyo mādhavācāryo nāma vedabhāṣyakṛt vādāhave lagno niraṅkuśaniśitatarkaśarāsāravarṣiṇaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:198: tena ca mādhavācāryeṇa svīye sarvadarśanasaṃgrahe rāmānujadarśanamupakṣipatā--- 'taduktaṃ veṅkaṭanāthena tattvamuktākakalāpe' ityupakramya, // śrīḥ //
